question: Which state government has launched the free sanitary napkin scheme 'Khushi' for girl students across the state?
explanation: The Odisha government has launched the free sanitary napkin scheme \'Khushi\' for girl students from Class 6 to 12 in all the government and government-aided schools in the state. The scheme will be implemented by the health and family welfare department of the state at a cost of Rs 70 crore per year.
